text:
i used the vssget function.
when it get data from vss,

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
Do you mean that SS.exe hangs? 

If you run ant -v you get the commands sent to the app. Run these on the command
line. if ss.exe still hangs, then it is an ss.exe problem.

the other issue may be that it is waiting for input, which would be a problem...

creator: stevel@apache.org
text: Ping. Is this still a problem? can you do what we asked earlier?
